CustomField.description: Date that indicates the current forecast period. Used in tandem with the `Forecast Period Type` field. example 1: Forecast Period Type = 'Quarter' | Forecast Period = 2024-01-01, representing a Q1 quarter call. example 2: Forecast Period Type = 'Month' | Forecast Period = 2024-01-01, representing a January monthly call.
CustomField.label: Forecast Period
